name: Call of Desert Zombies: Rissing of Dead Walkers
name_original: Call of Desert Zombies: Rissing of Dead Walkers
description:
Sit on the Seat of top class police car with most modern sniper fitted on driver seat to complete the most dangerours mission in world history, As our army headquarters reported that many dead zombies attacked in old desert village and infected many innocent peoples , so we are sending our best sniper solider to hunt those zombies.

Drive the police car and to kill the zombies comming towards your car at very fast speed you need to switch your game to kill mode and aim on those zombies go for direct head shoots.

Enjoy this free zombies hunting mission games,best of luck.
